overview: After living all his chilhood in the street, a young boy notices rapidly that crime doesn't pay and thatÂ´s why he decides to become a policeman. One day, one of his best friends go in prison for a murder he didn't commit. Immediately the policeman tries his best to release him and prove his innocence.
tagline: It's gang war on the streets of New York...when a bunch of half-pint racketeers go "civic-minded' to put the skids under a crime czar!
title: East Side Kids
